<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.StatusReportHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>StatusReportHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var StatusReportHelper = Class.create();
StatusReportHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    json: function () {
        return new JSON();
    },

    projectStatus: function (sysId) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("project_status");
        gr.addQuery("project", sysId);
        gr.orderByDesc("as_on");
        gr.query();
        gr.next();
        return gr;
    },

    statusReport: function (entity, entityId, fiscalYearSysId, callerId) {
        var categories = [];
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Overall'), name: 'overall'});
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Schedule'), name: 'schedule'});
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Cost'), name: 'cost'});
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Resources'), name: 'resources'});
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Scope'), name: 'scope'});
        var data = [];
        var fundingRecs;
        if(entity == 'portfolio') {
            fundingRecs = (new PPMProjectFunding()).findAllTasksInBudgetPlan('portfolio', entityId, fiscalYearSysId, undefined, true);
        } else {
            var gr = new GlideRecord('pm_program');
            gr.get(entityId);
            fundingRecs = callerId == "program_status_report" ? new ProgramStatus(entityId).allProjects() : (new Program(gr)).projects(fiscalYearSysId);
        }
        while(fundingRecs.next()) {
            var taskGr;
            if ( entity == 'portfolio' )
                taskGr = fundingRecs.task.getRefRecord();
            else
                taskGr = fundingRecs;
            if(taskGr.instanceOf('pm_project')) {
                var projectId = taskGr.getValue('sys_id');
                var projectStatusGr = this.projectStatus(projectId);
                data.push({ sys_id: taskGr.getValue('sys_id'),
                            name: taskGr.getValue('short_description'),
                            overall: projectStatusGr.getValue('overall_health') || 'None',
                            schedule: projectStatusGr.getValue('schedule') || 'None',
                            cost: projectStatusGr.getValue('cost') || 'None',
                            resources: projectStatusGr.getValue('resources') || 'None',
                            scope: projectStatusGr.getValue('scope') || 'None',
                            overall_comments: projectStatusGr.getValue('comments'),
                            schedule_comments: projectStatusGr.getValue('schedule_comments'),
                            cost_comments: projectStatusGr.getValue('cost_comments'),
                            resources_comments: projectStatusGr.getValue('resources_comments'),
                            scope_comments: projectStatusGr.getValue('scope_comments')
                        });
            }
        }
        var response = { categories: categories,
                 data: data 
                };
        return response;
    },
	
    type: 'StatusReportHelper'
};]]></script>
